It's my 5th trip to Kyot=
o, but my first time staying in that
particular area. I've always stayed fu=
rther East in Yamashina, and
since I've already seen the major stuff, now I=
'm just going to spend a
week walking around the city to find the off-the-b=
eaten-path stuff.
I'll also be about a half mile or so from Nijo palace, so=
 I'll head
over there as well.  I also plan on hitting Osaka castle again, =
as
well as Mt. Hiei and the Enryakuji monastery. Sort of beyond the scope
o=
f the Shinsengumi, but still in my area of interest.
